etymologies: early 21st century: from grim and dark (or darkness)

definitions: a genre of fiction, especially fantasy fiction, characterized by disturbing, violent, or bleak subject matter and a dystopian setting

examples.text: I was super into grimdark when I was in college

shortDefinitions: genre of fiction characterized by disturbing or bleak subject matter

definitions: (of fiction, especially fantasy fiction) characterized by disturbing, violent, or bleak subject matter and a dystopian setting

examples.text: there were two series that were too grimdark for me

shortDefinitions: (of fiction) characterized by disturbing, violent, or bleak subject matter and a dystopian setting
